description: Xian burger is pretty good, over priced now. Spice bags are very nice too but just not worth the price anymore.
Decent buffet in the city center. Dinner is better than lunch, more variety and seems fresher. Hashbrowns are very good.
The typical chinese, nothing crazy. Decent portion for the price and food is good enough.
CLOSED! Kinda mid, the venue and atmosphere is really nice though. Unfortunately, Fasta has permanently closed down, rip.
Good burgers, nice student deal. The wowburger near grafton street opposite Brown Thomas over cook the fries though. Atmosphere in all there locations are nice.
This is the go to. Nice little pizza and burger place on talbot street. All day special goes hard, worth the price. The area is just a bit dodgey tho lol
Very nice spicy box, big portion. However do NOT get it past like 10pm, they just chuck random stuff in there and for this reason they have gotten a lower score
mid, thats about it. Venue and atmosphere is very nice though. If you're vegan or vegetarian I guess it's good.
Cheap food - not bad, would rather go star pizza though.
Very nice place if you like chicken burgers. The GOAT burger is the best in my opinion. Cheesecakes there are also very good.
Very good place, best hot dogs in Dublin from what I know. Unfortunately they closed the one on tara street.
Nice place, food was good and the place was full. A bit pricey though. Loaded fries are swag.
This place use to be better, now they made the portions smaller. Also quite expensive. Staff are friendly and the atmosphere is nice.
very mid, microwave ah food. Lucky it's even getting mentioned. Doesn't even deserve a picture.
Pretty good food, good milkshakes and they got a nice student deal. Solid place to munch.
Decent place on Grafton street. They got student deal (€10.95) which is quite good. The nachos are pretty good too.
Nice place where you can get Korean style burgers. The K-BBQ burger and poutine are great. Ice-cream sandwich is so ass though don't get, it was like €8 a for super tough, mid ice-cream sandwich.
